body_html: @maplewizard If you have root access, you may upgrade glib and be able to install bazel, then use it to compile tensorflow. If you don't have root access, as far as I know it's very difficult to install bazel and tensorflow on redhat 5 or redhat 6.
body_text: @maplewizard If you have root access, you may upgrade glib and be able to install bazel, then use it to compile tensorflow. If you don't have root access, as far as I know it's very difficult to install bazel and tensorflow on redhat 5 or redhat 6.
body: @maplewizard If you have root access, you may upgrade glib and be able to install bazel, then use it to compile tensorflow. If you don't have root access, as far as I know it's very difficult to install bazel and tensorflow on redhat 5 or redhat 6.
